title: ICE / ANDRE barks
description: Things Noid says inside the church.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""This is gonna bring Revachol toget..."
Andre: ""I should start making the fires no..."
dialogueTree.english: "I should start making the fires now."

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""This place is wa-aaaay *under* the..."
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Гэтае месца знаходзіцца на цэлыя кіламэтры *пад* зямлёй».

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""With a full house, it's gonna be a..."
dialogueTree.english: "With a full house, it's gonna be a mad-house. I love it."
dialogueTree.polish: „Gdy pojawią się ludzie, zacznie się szalona zabawa. Rewelacja”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: „Калі з'явяцца людзі, пачнецца шаленая забава. Рэвалюцыя”.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""I can already see it, crème de la..."
dialogueTree.english: "I can already see it, crème de la crème of Revachol..."
dialogueTree.polish: „Już to widzę – crème de la crème Revacholu...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Ужо гэта бачу – crème de la crème Рэвачолу...»

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Everybody letting it *all* hang ou..."
dialogueTree.english: "Everybody letting it *all* hang out -- elite entertainment zone."

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""All of Revachol is gonna flock in..."
dialogueTree.english: "All of Revachol is gonna flock in here."
